entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Clearwater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:17 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clearwater 2:00 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: SSE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Fog patches becoming fog this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of rain beginning in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023
